short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple looping extension for Youtube music learning and song memorizing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Youtube song learning extension creates multiple loops to repeat any count you want. 


* simple UI on song's Youtube page
* just add loops and start loop or how many times you want to repeat
